solution_line_template: His water bottle holds {bottle_ounces} ounces which he drinks {refills_per_day} times a day, {bottle_ounces} x {refills_per_day} = <<{bottle_ounces}*{refills_per_day}={daily_ounces}>>{daily_ounces} ounces a typical day.
Over {days} days, without spilling anything, Remi drinks {daily_ounces} ounces x {days} days = <<{daily_ounces}*{days}={total_ounces_no_spill}>>{total_ounces_no_spill} ounces.
Except Remi spills {spill2} + {spill1} ounces of water during the week = <<{spill2}+{spill1}={total_spilled}>>{total_spilled} ounces of water Remi spills.

Total, Remi drinks {total_ounces_no_spill} ounces - {total_spilled} ounces of spilled water = <<{total_ounces_no_spill}-{total_spilled}={total_ounces}>>{total_ounces} ounces Remi drank during the week.
